examples: I have zero siblings.
I have zero dollars in my wallet.
She counted zero stars in the sky.
There were zero people in the park.
Reeve shot from zero to hero in the 1978 blockbuster, Superman.
words.defineEn: the number 0; nothing of something
words.defineVi: số 0; không có gì

examples: The teacher called out our names one by one for attendance.
A hundred cents make one euro.
The Maasai tribe is one of the indigenous tribes of Africa.
The appointment of a woman was one in the eye for male domination.
Neither one seems like the sharpest pencil in the box.
words.defineEn: the number 1; the number of sun in the sky
words.defineVi: số 1; số mặt trời trên bầu trời

examples: Take two from ten.
Two could play at that game, smart guy.
The twins have two bicycles.
Two faces appeared at our window.
Better one house spoiled than two.
words.defineEn: the number 2; the number of wheels on a bicycle
words.defineVi: số 2; số lượng bánh xe trên một chiếc xe đạp

examples: Three players got their marching orders last week.
The clock said three o'clock.
The town is three miles away.
Three cheers for Sarah, whose brilliant goal at the last minute won us the game!
Detectives had closed the book on the Hornsey Murders case three years previously.
words.defineEn: the number 3; the number of sides in a triangle
words.defineVi: số 3; số cạnh trong một tam giác

examples: The recipe serves four people.
This dish will serve four hungry people.
The storekeeper changed my dollar bill for four quarters.
Our dining table has four chairs around it.
The bill was four votes shy of a majority.
words.defineEn: the number 4; the number of seasons in a year
words.defineVi: số 4; số mùa trong năm

examples: Our cat has just had five kittens.
He did five years for manslaughter.
I gave it five out of ten.
Williams broke her opponent's serve five times.
Five pounds doesn't buy much nowadays.
words.defineEn: the number 5; the number of fingers we have on one hand
words.defineVi: số 5; số ngón tay chúng ta có trên một bàn tay

examples: Three and three is six.
He did six years for armed robbery.
The six years that followed his restoration.
Six people, and more at a pinch, could be seated comfortably at the table.
By six o'clock after a busy day I'm at the end of my rope.
words.defineEn: the number 6; the number of strings on some guitars
words.defineVi: số 6; số lượng dây trên một số cây đàn guitar

examples: The recipe called for seven ingredients.
The week is divided into seven days.
Over seven hundred Facebook users have already liked the company’s website.
It's a reminder that one year's seeding makes seven years' weeding.
In 1991, the Department of Transport was caught with its pants down and took seven months to produce the document needed to change legislation.
words.defineEn: the number 7; the number of days in a week
words.defineVi: số 7; số ngày trong một tuần

examples: The grounds covered eight acres.
The government has created eight new peers.
Eight people were held hostage for four months.
The recipe called for eight ounces of flour, which is about one cup.
I usually sleep for eight hours every night.
words.defineEn: the number 8; the number of legs on a spider
words.defineVi: số 8; số lượng chân trên một con nhện

examples: The baseball team has nine players on the field at a time.
A wonder lasts but nine days.
I start work at nine.
Still on cloud nine weeks after winning the championship.
Surprisingly, nine of the 31 Republicans in the Assembly broke ranks to vote with the Democrats.
words.defineEn: the number 9; the number of months in a normal pregnancy
words.defineVi: số 9; số tháng trong một thai kỳ bình thường

examples: Take two from ten.
The clock says ten past two.
The soccer team has ten players on the field at a time.
He got ten years for armed robbery.
Your plane leaves in ten minutes.
words.defineEn: the number 10; the number of fingers we have on both hands
words.defineVi: số 10; số ngón tay chúng ta có trên cả hai bàn tay

examples: Today is Monday.
I'm going monk mode from Monday.
Jessica died Monday.
I have a team meeting every Monday afternoon.
After a fun weekend I was back in harness on Monday, handling paperwork at my desk.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Sunday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau chủ nhật

examples: Tuesdays usually are my busiest days at work.
The Supreme Court heard the case on Tuesday.
The party will be on Tuesday, rain or shine.
I use Tuesdays to work on my personal projects and hobbies.
I meet my study group at the library on Tuesday afternoons.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Monday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ Hai

examples: Wednesday is my favorite day of the week.
I have a lunch date with my best friend every Wednesday.
Wednesday is the middle of the week.
The deal will be agreed on Wednesday, knock on wood.
They're going on holiday on Wednesday so they're all over the moon.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Tuesday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ ba

examples: Thursday is my daughter's favorite day of the week.
Thursday is the day after Wednesday and before Friday.
Thursday is almost the weekend.
I have a dentist appointment on Thursday.
Robbie opened his heart after a secret charity gig at London's Equinox club on Thursday.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Wednesday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ Tư

examples: The party is on Friday evening.
His favorite band is playing a concert on Friday night.
US President Joe Biden got the clean bill of health on Friday after a detailed physical examination.
My friend's birthday is on a Friday this year.
Matt came round each Friday, regular as clockwork.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Thursday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ năm

examples: A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
The team should walk it on Saturday.
Saturdays are when I plan and prepare meals for the upcoming week.
I look forward to Saturday evenings because I meet up with friends for dinner.
France are playing against Wales on Saturday.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Friday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ sáu

examples: Work on Sunday?
By Sunday morning she was running a temperature.
They gathered in the dining room for Sunday brunch.
Grandma's clabber pancakes are a family favorite for Sunday brunch.
She cooked a mouthwatering pheasant roast for her family's Sunday dinner.
words.defineEn: ‌the day that takes place after Saturday
words.defineVi: ‌ngày diễn ra sau thứ bảy

examples: Hello, I'm new here.
Hello, it's good to see you again.
Hello, I am the new student and my name is Sarah.
She said hello to me and I went weak in the knees.
Come and say hello.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we see someone and want to greet them, or when we begin to talk on the phone
words.defineVi: một từ chúng ta nói khi nhìn thấy ai đó và muốn chào họ, hoặc khi chúng ta bắt đầu nói chuyện điện thoại

examples: Hi, what is your name?
Hi, would you like to join us for lunch?
He introduced himself by saying, "Hi, my name is Alex."
Hi, nice to meet you.
Hi, here to buy your country.
words.defineEn: we say when we see someone and want to greet them
words.defineVi: chúng ta nói khi chúng ta thấy ai đó và muốn chào họ

examples: Please say yes!
Oh yes, enough said.
Yes, I'm as snug as a bug in a rug.
Yes, he is my friend.
Yes, that's a great idea!
words.defineEn: a word that shows we agree with something or think that it is true when answering a question
words.defineVi: một từ cho thấy chúng tôi đồng ý với một cái gì đó hoặc nghĩ rằng đó là sự thật khi trả lời một câu hỏi

examples: Her answer is no.
This policy is no longer an effective means to an end.
Journalists on the spot reported no progress.
They mean no harm.
They mean no harm.
words.defineEn: used to give an answer to a question showing that we do not agree or it is not true
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để đưa ra câu trả lời cho một câu hỏi cho thấy rằng chúng tôi không đồng ý hoặc nó không đúng

examples: OK, mum's the word!
OK, it’s a deal.
Ok, we can have pasta for dinner tonight.
OK, I'll do it -
OK, what happened at Blair's party last night?
words.defineEn: said to show that we are agreeing to do something or we agree with something
words.defineVi: nói để thể hiện rằng chúng tôi đang đồng ý làm điều gì đó hoặc chúng tôi đồng ý với điều gì đó

examples: 'Thanks,' he answered.
Thanks Courtney for sending this out.
- Thanks, I thrifted it.
- Yeah. - Thanks, Wren, for sponsoring today's video.
- Thanks dudes, we'll see you tomorrow.
words.defineEn: said when someone helps us or does something nice for us
words.defineVi: nói khi ai đó giúp chúng tôi hoặc làm điều gì đó tốt đẹp cho chúng tôi

examples: "Sorry, I've run out."
Sorry, I'm still really groggy.
Sorry, what did you say?
Sorry, I don't follow.
Sorry, could you please hand me the book?
words.defineEn: a word we say to apologize for something or to say we are embarrassed
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói để xin lỗi cho một cái gì đó hoặc để nói rằng chúng tôi đang xấu hổ

examples: The passengers waved goodbye to their loved ones from the ship's deck.
Goodbye, take care of yourself.
Well, you can wave goodbye to your brand new car, mister!
Goodbye, I hope to see you again.
She waved goodbye and was off to catch her train.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we are leaving or someone is leaving, or at the end of a phone call
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi rời đi hoặc ai đó đang rời đi, hoặc khi kết thúc cuộc gọi điện thoại

examples: I see you later, bye!
Bye. Say bye.
Bye. Say bye.
Have a good one, bye.
Have a good one, bye.
words.defineEn: a word we say when we are leaving someone or when they are leaving, or at the end of a phone call
words.defineVi: một từ chúng tôi nói khi chúng tôi rời khỏi ai đó hoặc khi họ rời đi, hoặc khi kết thúc cuộc gọi điện thoại
